notes: This is the orthographic transcription of the audio of the Polish Film Chronicles (Polska Kronika Filmowa - PKF) between the years 1945-1962. The transcription is mostly hand-checked and should match the audio to a high degree. Only the narrator is transcribed (which is the vast majority of all speech in the recordings).
title: Transcriptions of the Polish Film Chronicles (Polska Kronika Filmowa) - years 1945-1962
